**`r other_traits_list[[i]]$fullname`**

```{r}
if (ncomp == 3) {
  RR <- rank_tricot(data = cmdata[other_traits_list[[i]]$keep, ],
                    items = itemnames,
                    input = other_traits_list[[i]]$input)
}

if (ncomp > 3) {
  RR <- rank_numeric(data = cmdata[other_traits_list[[i]]$keep, ],
                     items = itemnames,
                     input = other_traits_list[[i]]$input)
}




cont_t <- summarise_victories(RR)
```
